data.title: John Barnes
data.meta_description: John Barnes is a prolific American science fiction author, born in 1957. His stories are often focused on social issues. Orbital Resonance Kaleidoscope Century Candle The Sky So Big and Black A Million Open Doors Earth Made of Glass The Merchants of Souls The Armies of Memory Wartide Battle Cry...
data.text:
John Barnes is a prolific American science fiction author, born in 1957. His stories are often focused on social issues.

Orbital Resonance

Kaleidoscope Century

Candle

The Sky So Big and Black

Caesar's Bicycle

Timeline Wars

Duke of Uranium
